snippet: Of the 35 works for sale, only one failed to find a buyer, and the sale pulled in $134.6 million, about $10 million over its estimate.
abstract: Christie's stages highly publicized auction experiment that is runaway success; sale includes mixture of hot, younger artists alongside established superstars; of the 35 works for sale, only one fails to find a buyer, and sale pulls in $134.6 million, about $10 million over its estimate.
lead_paragraph: Of the 35 works for sale, only one failed to find a buyer, and the sale pulled in $134.6 million, about $10 million over its estimate.

headline.main: At Christie’s Auction, an Experiment Proves Fruitful
headline.print_headline: At Christie’s Auction, an Experiment Proves Fruitful
